Occupation History:
Møller Oddershede Friis is a 31 year old and comes from Denmark.
In 2018, Møller Oddershede Friis started working as a Plant Manager at Velux A/S, marking the beginning of his successful career.
At Vestas Wind Systems A/S, he held the position of Operations Director from 2023 till now, making significant contributions to the organization.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 220000 DKK, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
He has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 3690000 DKK.
